name: Hotel Eiger

reviews.title: Good hotel, stunning views, excellent service.
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Eiger for eight nights at the beginning of July and received a warm welcome the minute we entered the building. The room was clean and tidy and the view across to the Eiger was breathtaking.

reviews.title: Great vllage, nice hotel.
reviews.text: The 5 course dinner in the restaurant was good and the waitresses very friendly.

reviews.title: Could try harder
reviews.text: Murren is a beautiful village that hasn't been spoiled by becoming over commercialized like Grindelwald. The hotel swimming pool is rather small but there is an excellent pool at the sports centre just 5 minutes walk.
The mountain walks from the village are well marked and suitable for all abilities.
reviews.title: Exceeded expectations, wonderful location

description: Hotel Eiger in car free Mürren – the perfect hideaway for some days in the mountains situated on a sunny plateau underneath the Schilthorn (James Bond location). Only 1 ½ hours from Bern-Belp and in the middle of the Swiss Alps. We offer charming rooms, an indoor pool with sauna and massage, panoramic restaurant with tasty options, free WLAN and conference room for you next summit meeting. The Hotel Eiger is owned and personally managed by the young Staehli family.
